org.jetel.graph.runtime.tracker

Class PrimitiveComponentTokenTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.graph.runtime.tracker.PrimitiveComponentTokenTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentTokenTracker

    public class PrimitiveComponentTokenTracker
extends java.lang.Object
implements ComponentTokenTracker
    Default component token tracker which is used by all components in case regular ETL graph execution.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

        public void eofInputPort(int portNum)
        Description copied from interface: ComponentTokenTracker

      • unifyTokens

        public void unifyTokens(DataRecord sourceToken,
               DataRecord targetToken)
        Description copied from interface: ComponentTokenTracker
        Token identification of two given tokens is synchronized. Both tokens are from now considered equal.
        Specified by:
        unifyTokens in interface ComponentTokenTracker
